com.barryholroyd.prodlisthpdemo.config

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.barryholroyd.prodlisthpdemo.config.Settings

  • public final class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with static constants to configure the app.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  Settings.Keys
      Keys will be used as Strings for SharePreferences.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static boolean appDisplayUrl
      Toggle display of image url in name field (for debugging).

      Tracing flag for app-level logging.

      Tracing flag for activity lifecycle events.
      (package private) static boolean appTraceDetails
      Tracing flag for detailed disk and network cache logging (flagged with "DETAILS").

      If true, use Thread for image loading, otherwise use AsyncTask.

      Names for the cache directories.

      Clear the disk cache when the app starts up.

      Disk cache toggle.

      Disk space (in bytes) to allocate for the disk cache.
      (package private) static boolean diskCacheTrace
      Tracing flag for the image disk cache.
      (package private) static boolean imageLoaderTrace
      Tracing flag for ImageLoader logging.
      (package private) static boolean memoryCacheByBytes
      Specify memory cache in percent of total memory or in bytes.
      (package private) static boolean memoryCacheOn
      Memory cache toggle
      (package private) static long memoryCacheSizeBytes
      Memory (in bytes) to allocate for the memory cache.
      (package private) static int memoryCacheSizePercent
      Percent of total memory to use for the memory cache.
      (package private) static boolean memoryCacheTrace
      Tracing flag for the image memory cache.
      (package private) static boolean networkTrace
      Tracing flag for the networking module.

      • memoryCacheByBytes

        static boolean memoryCacheByBytes
        Specify memory cache in percent of total memory or in bytes.

      • memoryCacheSizePercent

        static int memoryCacheSizePercent
        Percent of total memory to use for the memory cache. Relevant iff memoryCacheByBytes == true.

      • memoryCacheSizeBytes

        static long memoryCacheSizeBytes
        Memory (in bytes) to allocate for the memory cache. Relevant iff memoryCacheByBytes == false.

      • diskCacheOn

        static boolean diskCacheOn
        Disk cache toggle.

      • diskCacheTrace

        static boolean diskCacheTrace
        Tracing flag for the image disk cache.

        Disk space (in bytes) to allocate for the disk cache.

        Clear the disk cache when the app starts up.

        Tracing flag for ImageLoader logging.

      • networkTrace

        static boolean networkTrace
        Tracing flag for the networking module.
